name: MyQuestToTeach
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my quest two teach
des:
The vision of My Quest To Teach is to inspire, mentor and motivate youth and teens through the integration and innovation of web-based and voice technology. Sharing content that encourages and inspires creativity and innovation in youth and teens.

My Quest To Teach is a vision as a teacher of over 30 years, mentoring, guiding and volunteering in my community. My community is not just Jacksonville, FL it is nationally and internationally. Representation matters is a powerful statement that is transformative and generationally representative.

You can find out more about the My Quest To Teach blog at www.MyQuestToTeach.com. 

Engage the skill by saying:
Alexa, Start My Quest To Teach

Once the skill is engaged, try the following commands:
Play the latest blog post
Search for camp
Help

You can now hear My Quest to Teach blog posts in multiple languages including English and Spanish. Just say: "Speak in German" or "Talk to me in Spanish". To change back, just say Speak in English.

**For information about this Alexa skill, visit www.CreateMyVoice.com or send an email to Support@CreateMyVoice.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
